result.reasoning_summary: Selected 18 scenes to maintain pacing while covering the full 161.3 seconds. Prioritized scenes with strong visual imagery (violence, money, consequences) while ensuring narrative flow. Balanced high-energy violent scenes with moments of reflection and character development. Each scene transitions seamlessly to the next with no timeline gaps. The selection creates an arc from aggressive confidence through consequences to final apocalyptic imagery.

result.reasoning_summary: Selected 19 scenes to maintain narrative flow while ensuring complete timeline coverage. Focused on segments with highest visual potential (violent imagery, specific locations, emotional moments) while maintaining the song's gritty authenticity. Scenes progress from establishing violent credibility through paranoid survival to defiant wealth declarations, culminating in the nuclear metaphor finale. Balanced high-energy action scenes with character development moments to create cinematic variety while staying true to the song's raw street narrative.
